title: Fitness center, Dog Park, Gazebo with gas BBQ
map_address: 2750 West Wigwam Avenue near West Wigwam and Las Vegas Blvd
posting_body: ['Amalfi', '2750 West Wigwam Avenue , Enterprise, NV, 89123', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 8', 'OR Text', '8', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Blissful Comfort and Serene Sophistication', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 3 Bath, approximately 1126 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Amalfi Apartments in Las Vegas, NV', 'Conveniently located at the intersection of Highway 15 and Blue Diamond Rd, Amalfi’s bright floor plans and picturesque community create an ideal setting for easy living.', 'Las Vegas is a straight-shot, 15-minute drive away, and a sprawling expanse of state parks & mountains beckon from just half an hour west.', 'Residents here enjoy access to everything the city has to offer, comfortably set in the center of it all.', 'Blissful comfort and serene sophistication compose an everyday paradise— the signature Amalfi experience.', 'Browse our photo galleries and video tours here, and let us introduce you to gourmet kitchens, the resort-style pool and spa, expansive dog park, and all the premium features that await you in Las Vegas.', 'Features', '- Garden-style tubs', '- Built-in computer desk', '- Fireplace', '- High ceilings', '- Selected', '- Patios & balconies', '- Breakfast bars', '- Luxurious bathrooms', '- Full appliance package', '- Chef-inspired kitchens', 'Community Amenities', '- Professional landscaping', '- Pet friendly', '- Garages', '- On-site management team', '- Gazebo with gas BBQ', '- Picnic area', '- Fitness center', '- Free WiFi', '- On-site convenience store', '- Selected', '- Clubhouse', '- Pool & spa', '- Dog Park', '- Gated entry', 'Office Hours', 'Monday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday: 11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $350, Rent $45, Deposit $150', 'Comments: Pets are welcome but limited to two per unit.', 'Please note that residents will be required to pay a $350 initial pet fee.', 'Additionally, monthly rent increases by $45 for those with pets.', 'Certain breed restrictions may apply.', 'Please see leasing office for details.', 'uWLF0FOAgk']
